summary: A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.
cast: Jackie Chan|Michelle Ferre|Mirai Yamamoto|Ron Smerczak|Ed Nelson|Ton Pompert|Glory Simon|Fred van Ditmarsch|Fritz Krommenhoek|Dick Rienstra|Rinaldo van Ommeren|Pim Daane|Jeremiah Fleming|Neil Berger|Dik Brinksma|Frank van Velsen|David Leong Fie|Dehan Wiebenberg|Yanick Mbali|Washington Xisolo|Jerry Priele|Patrick Mofokeng|Al Karaki|Gavin Genlloud|Rob Mathews|Grant Nale|Norman Anstey|Frank Opperman|Leonard Nketsi|Ross Preller|Jerry Tsie|Dale Abrahams|Lambert Millar|Hannes Muller|David Vlok|Caz Abrahams|Rafi Anteby|Leen Ducienne|Marco Maas|Robin Mes|Ral Sitaropoulos|Mike Lambert|Chip Bray|Richard van Drempt|Piet Hoogstraten|Russ Price|Michael Roben|Ronald Schuurbiers|Michael Struik|Hans Cornelissen|Simon Jansen|Michiel Kerbosch|Boris Aribaut|Steve Brettingham|Yutphichai Chanlekha|Ted John Michael Lundell|Nicolas Ng|David John Saunders|Hattan|Kane Kosugi|Yung Kwan|Ron Smoorenburg|Bradley James Allan|Paul Andreovski|Brent Houghton|Ken Lo|Michel Struik|Philip van der Eijk
title: Who Am I? (¿Quién soy?)
